listings.comment: Recommended, time and time again. Sourav and I have been working together regulary for years. He has such high level of expertise in all things custom javascript/css/html and attention to detail. on the one hand. On the other, while working with him, you will find that he also takes pride in his work and aims to provide you with the best solution, suggesting improvements and hinting on issues you didnt think about earlier to make sure your project is a success. A pleasure to work with him.

Another project we successfully accomblished together. This time, it involved a second API (DHL), which was not well documented. We also had to implement additional logic as legacy data caused unforseen issues and I faced some troubles deloying the code, which Sourav delivered flawlessly. Through all of that, I could count on Souravs patiences and guidance to get the project successfully done, which was much appreciated. I can recommend working with him - he knows his craft very well and is a pleasure to work with.
Yet another successful project with Sourav - I can not say enough how glad I am to be able to work with him. If you entrust him with your code work, it is in good hands :).

Sourav Malo's work was nothing short of exceptional. The professionalism and detailed documentation truly exceeded my expectations. His deep understanding and proactive communication made working with him a breeze. 👍 Highly recommend!
My project went very smoothly and the work was good! I will be coming back for more or for when I have new projects! Everything was very professional and I’m grateful 👍
